content: the district court in ljubljana made a decision in a legal procedure regarding an inheritance case the court determined that the deceased persons assets including goods bank accounts pension benefits and real estate should be divided among five heirs the division of assets was specified with each heir receiving a certain portion the court applied specific laws such as the inheritance act and the civil procedure act in making its decision the court also acknowledged a legally probated will and established the testamentary succession one of the heirs claimed a forced share which the court considered in its decision the court also addressed a dispute regarding a subsistence agreement involving real estate the value of the estate was estimated and the heirs agreed on the distribution of funds the court fee for the legal procedure was determined and the heirs were responsible for paying it based on their inherited shares finally the heirs needed to arrange the succession and register the immovable property in the land register the text also explains the process of appealing an order related to inheritance including the timeframe and requirements for submitting an appeal

metadata.subject_of_succession: funds on silver bank account, unpaid pension benefits, 2 golden rings, ½ of the real estate (garage)
